comments:
Description:
InvalidJSExpr when copy a table and delete the bookmark setting in the paste table.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a datasource and dataset
2. Drag the dataset to Layout and set bookmark "a" in the table.
3. Copy and paste the table, delete bookmark "a" of the second table in Property Editor.
4. Preview.

Expected result:
No errors.

Cause:
I deleted "a" in Property Editor but in xml source "<expression name="bookmark"></expression>" were not deleted. After deleted it, preview is ok.

Actual result:
There are errors on the report page: 
-There are error(s) in Table : 344 
Error0 : data.engine.InvalidJSExpr ( 1 time(s) )

Shall model delete the all tag pair?

Sorry for the wrong reproduce step .

Steps:
1. Insert a table and input "a" in bookmark, then press enter after input "a".
2. Select "a" and delete it 
3. Preview.

Such issue exists in table/list but not in label/text.
Reassgin to engine team to deal with the expression with blank value.
